lines.originalLine: npctalk(_("Ohhhhhhh...."));
lines.message: Ohhhhhhh....

lines.originalLine: mes("[Wounded]");
lines.message: [Wounded]

lines.originalLine: mes("Wow! Thank you a lot!");
lines.message: Wow! Thank you a lot!

lines.originalLine: mes("I don't know how this happened to our ship");
lines.message: I don't know how this happened to our ship

lines.originalLine: mes("but we should go to see the captain.");
lines.message: but we should go to see the captain.

lines.originalLine: mes("... ohh, it seems my body is injured too much.");
lines.message: ... ohh, it seems my body is injured too much.

lines.originalLine: mes("Maybe you can go without me?");
lines.message: Maybe you can go without me?

lines.originalLine: mes("Luckily the water does not occupy the ship.");
lines.message: Luckily the water does not occupy the ship.

lines.originalLine: mes("I wait here, you should go and see the captain.");
lines.message: I wait here, you should go and see the captain.

lines.originalLine: mes("I'm fine! I'm fine!");
lines.message: I'm fine! I'm fine!

lines.originalLine: mes("Don't worry about me, you should really go to the captain!");
lines.message: Don't worry about me, you should really go to the captain!

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dff!- Information -!^000000");
lines.message: ^4d4dff!- Information -!^000000

lines.originalLine: mes("NPC Quest Received.");
lines.message: NPC Quest Received.

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dffQuest info Shortcut is Alt + U^000000 You can check your quest status there anytime.");
lines.message: ^4d4dffQuest info Shortcut is Alt + U^000000 You can check your quest status there anytime.

lines.originalLine: npctalk(_("Urgh... please... help me..."));
lines.message: Urgh... please... help me...

lines.originalLine: npctalk(_("In order to talk with me.. click my body.."));
lines.message: In order to talk with me.. click my body..

lines.originalLine: mes("[Sailor]");
lines.message: [Sailor]

lines.originalLine: mes("The ship is heading to Izlude soon~!");
lines.message: The ship is heading to Izlude soon~!

lines.originalLine: mes("I'll let you know when we set sail~!");
lines.message: I'll let you know when we set sail~!

lines.originalLine: mes("Unbelievable, perfect! Any chance you want to join my crew?");
lines.message: Unbelievable, perfect! Any chance you want to join my crew?

lines.originalLine: mes("Enough talking!!");
lines.message: Enough talking!!

lines.originalLine: mes("Come on, we're ready to set sails!");
lines.message: Come on, we're ready to set sails!

lines.originalLine: mes("Thank you so much!");
lines.message: Thank you so much!

lines.originalLine: mes("If you want to sail with us to Izlude, jump on board!");
lines.message: If you want to sail with us to Izlude, jump on board!

lines.originalLine: mes("Oh, and take thos ^4d4dffMagnifier^000000.");
lines.message: Oh, and take thos ^4d4dffMagnifier^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("When you hunt monsters you can find ^4d4dffunidentified items^000000.");
lines.message: When you hunt monsters you can find ^4d4dffunidentified items^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("Using a Magnifier will identify the item.");
lines.message: Using a Magnifier will identify the item.

lines.originalLine: mes("Maybe you have already some unidentified items from your fights with those porings?");
lines.message: Maybe you have already some unidentified items from your fights with those porings?

lines.originalLine: mes("These Porings stole my materials to repaid the ship. Will you help me to get them back?");
lines.message: These Porings stole my materials to repaid the ship. Will you help me to get them back?

lines.originalLine: mes("There are plenty of Porings on this Island.");
lines.message: There are plenty of Porings on this Island.

lines.originalLine: mes("I really appreciate it if you help me.");
lines.message: I really appreciate it if you help me.

lines.originalLine: mes("Apparently I am not allowed to move or discover this island.");
lines.message: Apparently I am not allowed to move or discover this island.

lines.originalLine: mes("Thats why I ask you~");
lines.message: Thats why I ask you~

lines.originalLine: mes("[Captain Carocc]");
lines.message: [Captain Carocc]

lines.originalLine: mes("There are still people in the cabins?!");
lines.message: There are still people in the cabins?!

lines.originalLine: mes("At least you are safe.");
lines.message: At least you are safe.

lines.originalLine: mes("Are you alright?");
lines.message: Are you alright?

lines.originalLine: mes("There are more people left?");
lines.message: There are more people left?

lines.originalLine: mes("I will send a rescue team to them");
lines.message: I will send a rescue team to them

lines.originalLine: mes("Thank you for your report");
lines.message: Thank you for your report

lines.originalLine: mes("Alright, thats good.");
lines.message: Alright, thats good.

lines.originalLine: mes("The storm came unexpected but I never thought it hit us that hard.");
lines.message: The storm came unexpected but I never thought it hit us that hard.

lines.originalLine: mes("At least, most people are already in safety.");
lines.message: At least, most people are already in safety.

lines.originalLine: mes("Look at the trees there, ^4d4dfffollow them to the southwest^000000 to find a new ship.");
lines.message: Look at the trees there, ^4d4dfffollow them to the southwest^000000 to find a new ship.

lines.originalLine: mes("The Ship will take you to ^4d4dffIzlude^000000, our original destination.");
lines.message: The Ship will take you to ^4d4dffIzlude^000000, our original destination.

lines.originalLine: mes("Ah! Speaking of it, those ^4d4dffPorings^000000 on this island drop material we need for repairs.");
lines.message: Ah! Speaking of it, those ^4d4dffPorings^000000 on this island drop material we need for repairs.

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dffKill the Porings and bring 2 Lumber to the southern crew^000000.");
lines.message: ^4d4dffKill the Porings and bring 2 Lumber to the southern crew^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("It is hard, but you look tough enough for this task.");
lines.message: It is hard, but you look tough enough for this task.

lines.originalLine: mes("Speaking of Porings, you have to equip your gears.");
lines.message: Speaking of Porings, you have to equip your gears.

lines.originalLine: mes("You should have a^4d4dffweapon and an armor^000000 equipped.");
lines.message: You should have a^4d4dffweapon and an armor^000000 equipped.

lines.originalLine: mes("!- Information -!");
lines.message: !- Information -!

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dffYou can equip gear or use items by simply double clicking them.");
lines.message: ^4d4dffYou can equip gear or use items by simply double clicking them.

lines.originalLine: mes("The item window can be opened by pressing Alt + E or using the buttons.^000000");
lines.message: The item window can be opened by pressing Alt + E or using the buttons.^000000

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dffEquipped Items can be seen by pressing ALT + Q.");
lines.message: ^4d4dffEquipped Items can be seen by pressing ALT + Q.

lines.originalLine: mes("Either double click or drag & drop them.^000000");
lines.message: Either double click or drag & drop them.^000000

lines.originalLine: mes("Kill Porings and bring the Lumber to the crew.");
lines.message: Kill Porings and bring the Lumber to the crew.

lines.originalLine: mes("Good Luck!");
lines.message: Good Luck!

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dffThe Ship^000000 anchored in the southwest. It will take you to Izlude.");
lines.message: ^4d4dffThe Ship^000000 anchored in the southwest. It will take you to Izlude.

lines.originalLine: mes("Don't forget to ^4d4dffget some Lumber^000000 for the ship.");
lines.message: Don't forget to ^4d4dffget some Lumber^000000 for the ship.

lines.originalLine: mes("Wear your equipment.");
lines.message: Wear your equipment.

lines.originalLine: mes("Your knife is more helpful than fists.");
lines.message: Your knife is more helpful than fists.

lines.originalLine: mes("Once you have the Lumber, talk to the crew.");
lines.message: Once you have the Lumber, talk to the crew.

lines.originalLine: mes("Everything is ready to sail over to Izlude.");
lines.message: Everything is ready to sail over to Izlude.

lines.originalLine: mes("The ship is located at the south-western part of the island.");
lines.message: The ship is located at the south-western part of the island.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Lumin]");
lines.message: [Lumin]

lines.originalLine: mes("Hey, you awake now?");
lines.message: Hey, you awake now?

lines.originalLine: mes("That quiet fella, I rescued him from the ocean.");
lines.message: That quiet fella, I rescued him from the ocean.

lines.originalLine: mes("Think he lost his memory.");
lines.message: Think he lost his memory.

lines.originalLine: mes("I gave him a new name 'Lumin'. But, just call him Lu...");
lines.message: I gave him a new name 'Lumin'. But, just call him Lu...

lines.originalLine: mes("And you can talk to other people like you just talked to me.");
lines.message: And you can talk to other people like you just talked to me.

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4fffLeft mouse click allows basic game control.");
lines.message: ^4d4fffLeft mouse click allows basic game control.

lines.originalLine: mes("Such as conversations with NPCs, movement, and attacks.^000000");
lines.message: Such as conversations with NPCs, movement, and attacks.^000000

lines.originalLine: mes("Many youngsters visit the ^4d4fffRune Midgard Kingdom^000000 to chase their dreams.");
lines.message: Many youngsters visit the ^4d4fffRune Midgard Kingdom^000000 to chase their dreams.

lines.originalLine: mes("Izlude is a satellite city of Prontera, the capital of the Rune Midgard Kingdom.");
lines.message: Izlude is a satellite city of Prontera, the capital of the Rune Midgard Kingdom.

lines.originalLine: mes("Izlude always welcomes young adventurers like you who have just started their journey in the world.");
lines.message: Izlude always welcomes young adventurers like you who have just started their journey in the world.

lines.originalLine: mes("You are one of them of course.");
lines.message: You are one of them of course.

lines.originalLine: mes("I would like to tell you more stories, but it's time to get ready for arrival.");
lines.message: I would like to tell you more stories, but it's time to get ready for arrival.

lines.originalLine: mes("There is an academy in Izlude for newcomers like yourself.");
lines.message: There is an academy in Izlude for newcomers like yourself.

lines.originalLine: mes("Let me give you more detail later.");
lines.message: Let me give you more detail later.

lines.originalLine: mes("See you back at the harbor deck.");
lines.message: See you back at the harbor deck.

lines.originalLine: mes("To get off this Island, you should enter the ^4d4fffShining Portal^000000 on the ship.");
lines.message: To get off this Island, you should enter the ^4d4fffShining Portal^000000 on the ship.

lines.originalLine: mes("All transportation is made through those portals.");
lines.message: All transportation is made through those portals.

lines.originalLine: mes("Yes.");
lines.message: Yes.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Carocc]");
lines.message: [Carocc]

lines.originalLine: mes("Oh, boy.");
lines.message: Oh, boy.

lines.originalLine: mes("What a cute reaction.");
lines.message: What a cute reaction.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Lu]");
lines.message: [Lu]

lines.originalLine: mes("- Lu just walked away with a cynical look on his face.");
lines.message: - Lu just walked away with a cynical look on his face.

lines.originalLine: mes("He's just shy, you know.");
lines.message: He's just shy, you know.

lines.originalLine: mes("You will see him again in Izlude, be good to him please.");
lines.message: You will see him again in Izlude, be good to him please.

lines.originalLine: mes("From now on, I'll be driving this ship around Izlude.");
lines.message: From now on, I'll be driving this ship around Izlude.

lines.originalLine: mes("Let's go, shall we?");
lines.message: Let's go, shall we?

lines.originalLine: mes("Why are you here at the wharf?");
lines.message: Why are you here at the wharf?

lines.originalLine: mes("I guess you are doing well at the academy.");
lines.message: I guess you are doing well at the academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("I'm going to be docking and reparing the ship here for a while.");
lines.message: I'm going to be docking and reparing the ship here for a while.

lines.originalLine: mes("I will be taking the same route I tried before.");
lines.message: I will be taking the same route I tried before.

lines.originalLine: mes("Hmm? You must be a student of the Criatura Academy?");
lines.message: Hmm? You must be a student of the Criatura Academy?

lines.originalLine: mes("Were you on my ship?");
lines.message: Were you on my ship?

lines.originalLine: mes("Hmm I can't remember.");
lines.message: Hmm I can't remember.

lines.originalLine: mes("Well, anything is fine.");
lines.message: Well, anything is fine.

lines.originalLine: mes("Shall I go easy on you since you said you were a student of the Academy?");
lines.message: Shall I go easy on you since you said you were a student of the Academy?

lines.originalLine: mes("I am still the captain of the ship, regardless.");
lines.message: I am still the captain of the ship, regardless.

lines.originalLine: mes("I plan on taking off as soon as the repairs are complete.");
lines.message: I plan on taking off as soon as the repairs are complete.

lines.originalLine: mes("The route will open with ^4d4dffPharos Lighthouse^000000 by then.");
lines.message: The route will open with ^4d4dffPharos Lighthouse^000000 by then.

lines.originalLine: mes("This is Izlude.");
lines.message: This is Izlude.

lines.originalLine: mes("The best city for you to take wings to your dreams.");
lines.message: The best city for you to take wings to your dreams.

lines.originalLine: mes("Although I don't have any particular feelings for you,");
lines.message: Although I don't have any particular feelings for you,

lines.originalLine: mes("I've seen a lot of young people like you, while operating the ship.");
lines.message: I've seen a lot of young people like you, while operating the ship.

lines.originalLine: mes("There were those among them who succeeded and failed and went back after being unable to adjust.");
lines.message: There were those among them who succeeded and failed and went back after being unable to adjust.

lines.originalLine: mes("I want you to have a successful start with this place.");
lines.message: I want you to have a successful start with this place.

lines.originalLine: mes("Did you know this?");
lines.message: Did you know this?

lines.originalLine: mes("Izlude has a new Institute for budding adventurers like you!");
lines.message: Izlude has a new Institute for budding adventurers like you!

lines.originalLine: mes("Yes! It's called the ^4d4dffRoyal Criatura Academy^000000.");
lines.message: Yes! It's called the ^4d4dffRoyal Criatura Academy^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("Founded by the Rune Midgard lineage to help out new adventurers.");
lines.message: Founded by the Rune Midgard lineage to help out new adventurers.

lines.originalLine: mes("A friend of mine works there, so I 'll give you the introduction to him.");
lines.message: A friend of mine works there, so I 'll give you the introduction to him.

lines.originalLine: mes("He could make a lot of things easier for you.");
lines.message: He could make a lot of things easier for you.

lines.originalLine: mes("He usually talks to new adventurers near the entrance of the academy.");
lines.message: He usually talks to new adventurers near the entrance of the academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("Go and meet him there.");
lines.message: Go and meet him there.

lines.originalLine: mes("His name is ^4d4dffHun^000000");
lines.message: His name is ^4d4dffHun^000000

lines.originalLine: mes("I will mark his spot on the map so go to see him.");
lines.message: I will mark his spot on the map so go to see him.

lines.originalLine: mes("The ^4d4dffMini map can be seen on the right top of the screen.");
lines.message: The ^4d4dffMini map can be seen on the right top of the screen.

lines.originalLine: mes("You can zoom in with +, zoom out with -. The waypoint from the NPC will be marked on it. ^000000");
lines.message: You can zoom in with +, zoom out with -. The waypoint from the NPC will be marked on it. ^000000

lines.message: Received a Quest from ^4d4dff Captain Carocc.

lines.message: The quest content can be checked from the quest window.

lines.originalLine: mes("Quest window can be opened by pressing ^4d4dffAlt + u^000000 keys together.");
lines.message: Quest window can be opened by pressing ^4d4dffAlt + u^000000 keys together.

lines.message: If you need more help with the map, press <NAVI>[Hun]<INFO>izlude,122,207</INFO></NAVI>here

lines.message: Yes, the part that says 'Hun'.

lines.message: ^4d4dffThe icon during talk <NAVI>[Hun]<INFO>izlude,122,207</INFO></NAVI> means a link to navigation directions.

lines.message: If you press info after selecting a task in the objectives^4d4dff,

lines.message: an arrow pointing to the location of the objective will pop up along with the navigation help.

lines.message: Anyway, my friend will help you register with the academy

lines.message: I hope it can help you for your future.

lines.message: Then there's no worry.

lines.originalLine: mes("He'll introduce you to the academy.");

lines.originalLine: mes("OK. I will show you the direction. You try it again.");
lines.message: OK. I will show you the direction. You try it again.

lines.originalLine: mes("By the way, did I tell you his name? His name is ^4d4dffHun^000000");
lines.message: By the way, did I tell you his name? His name is ^4d4dffHun^000000

lines.message: ^4d4dff Mini map can be seen on the right top of the screen.

lines.message: If you need more help with the map, press <NAVI>[Hun]<INFO>izlude,122,207</INFO></NAVI> here

lines.message: Yes, the part that says [Hun].

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dff the icon during talk <NAVI>[Hun]<INFO>izlude,122,207</INFO></NAVI> means");

lines.message: I hope it will help you out in your journey

lines.message: If you want, you can step forward to the world right away.

lines.originalLine: mes("However, I recommend you visit the Academy first.");
lines.message: However, I recommend you visit the Academy first.

lines.message: The world is a lonely place to be alone.

lines.originalLine: mes("The Academy has people you can make as lifetime companions.");
lines.message: The Academy has people you can make as lifetime companions.

lines.originalLine: mes("My friend Hun will be around the academy entrance.");
lines.message: My friend Hun will be around the academy entrance.

lines.originalLine: mes("If you don't know the way I'll point it out to you again.");
lines.message: If you don't know the way I'll point it out to you again.

lines.message: Anyway, my friend will help you register with the academy.

lines.message: I hope it will help you out in your journey.

lines.originalLine: mes("Still being dilligent?");
lines.message: Still being dilligent?

lines.originalLine: mes("I've been busy, also.");
lines.message: I've been busy, also.

lines.originalLine: mes("I was reparing the ship.");
lines.message: I was reparing the ship.

lines.originalLine: mes("I'll be taking off as soon as the repairs are complete.");
lines.message: I'll be taking off as soon as the repairs are complete.

lines.originalLine: mes("At that time, the sailing route to ^4d4dffPharos lighthouse ^000000 will be opened.");
lines.message: At that time, the sailing route to ^4d4dffPharos lighthouse ^000000 will be opened.

lines.originalLine: mes("Be excited for it.");
lines.message: Be excited for it.

lines.originalLine: mes("Hello?");
lines.message: Hello?

lines.originalLine: mes("Is it your first time on Izlude?");
lines.message: Is it your first time on Izlude?

lines.originalLine: mes("You look strong and able!");
lines.message: You look strong and able!

lines.originalLine: mes("I like able people like you!");
lines.message: I like able people like you!

lines.originalLine: mes("Always be healthy and strong as you are now.");
lines.message: Always be healthy and strong as you are now.

lines.originalLine: mes("I usually travel to ^4d4dffPharos Lighthouse^000000.");
lines.message: I usually travel to ^4d4dffPharos Lighthouse^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("But I'm resting up due to some problems.");
lines.message: But I'm resting up due to some problems.

lines.originalLine: mes("If it's Alberta or Byalan Island, talk to the next sailor.");
lines.message: If it's Alberta or Byalan Island, talk to the next sailor.

lines.originalLine: mes("Hmm? You said you didn't know what to do.");
lines.message: Hmm? You said you didn't know what to do.

lines.originalLine: mes("Since you're at Izlude, why don't you visit ^4d4dffCriatura Academy^000000?");
lines.message: Since you're at Izlude, why don't you visit ^4d4dffCriatura Academy^000000?

lines.originalLine: mes("Izlude has the Institute for budding adventurers like you");
lines.message: Izlude has the Institute for budding adventurers like you

lines.originalLine: mes("A friend of mine works there, so I'll give you the introduction to him.");
lines.message: A friend of mine works there, so I'll give you the introduction to him.

lines.originalLine: mes("He ususally talks to new adventurers near the entrance of an academy.");
lines.message: He ususally talks to new adventurers near the entrance of an academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("Go and meet him personally.");
lines.message: Go and meet him personally.

lines.originalLine: mes("I will mark his location on the map so go to see him.");
lines.message: I will mark his location on the map so go to see him.

lines.originalLine: mes("Received a Quest from ^4d4dffCaptain Carocc.");
lines.message: Received a Quest from ^4d4dffCaptain Carocc.

lines.originalLine: mes("Contents of your Quest can be monitored on the Quest information window.");
lines.message: Contents of your Quest can be monitored on the Quest information window.

lines.originalLine: mes("Quest window can be opened by pressing the ^4d4dffAlt + u^000000 key.");
lines.message: Quest window can be opened by pressing the ^4d4dffAlt + u^000000 key.

lines.originalLine: mes("Ah, it's you.");
lines.message: Ah, it's you.

lines.originalLine: mes("This guy has also decided to register at Criatura Academy.");
lines.message: This guy has also decided to register at Criatura Academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("This might be a good destiny for you. Hope you and him can be good friends.");
lines.message: This might be a good destiny for you. Hope you and him can be good friends.

lines.originalLine: mes("The Academy has people you could make into lifetime companions.");
lines.message: The Academy has people you could make into lifetime companions.

lines.originalLine: mes("My friend <NAVI>[Hun]<INFO>izlude,122,207</INFO></NAVI> will be around the academy entrance.");
lines.message: My friend <NAVI>[Hun]<INFO>izlude,122,207</INFO></NAVI> will be around the academy entrance.

lines.originalLine: mes("then, Good luck!");
lines.message: then, Good luck!

lines.originalLine: mes("Oh, We meet again.");
lines.message: Oh, We meet again.

lines.originalLine: mes("Do you by any chance need a ship?");
lines.message: Do you by any chance need a ship?

lines.originalLine: mes("I usually travel to the port in Paros.");
lines.message: I usually travel to the port in Paros.

lines.originalLine: mes("If you need to go to Paros later, come see me.");
lines.message: If you need to go to Paros later, come see me.

lines.originalLine: mes("It's been a while!");
lines.message: It's been a while!

lines.originalLine: mes("Looking at your expression, you must be doing well.");
lines.message: Looking at your expression, you must be doing well.

lines.originalLine: mes("Do you want to go to Pharos Lighthouse on the southern coast of Morocc?");
lines.message: Do you want to go to Pharos Lighthouse on the southern coast of Morocc?

lines.originalLine: mes("The fee is 2800 zeny. I have a crew that needs payment so this fee is non-negotiable.");
lines.message: The fee is 2800 zeny. I have a crew that needs payment so this fee is non-negotiable.

lines.originalLine: mes("Let us travel with the wing in our hair.");
lines.message: Let us travel with the wing in our hair.

lines.originalLine: mes("Sorry but you are short of the boarding fee.");
lines.message: Sorry but you are short of the boarding fee.

lines.originalLine: mes("I need 2800z to operate.");
lines.message: I need 2800z to operate.

lines.originalLine: mes("OK.");
lines.message: OK.

lines.originalLine: mes("Do you know this, by the way?");
lines.message: Do you know this, by the way?

lines.originalLine: mes("^4d4dffThere's a Rogue hideout at Pharos Lighthouse^000000.");
lines.message: ^4d4dffThere's a Rogue hideout at Pharos Lighthouse^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("You already knew this?");
lines.message: You already knew this?

lines.originalLine: mes("I thought you knew that I only go to Pharos?");
lines.message: I thought you knew that I only go to Pharos?

lines.originalLine: mes("Ask the sailor over there, he's the one that goes there frequently.");
lines.message: Ask the sailor over there, he's the one that goes there frequently.

lines.originalLine: mes("There are plenty of other ships that travel to Alberta and Byalan Islands.");

lines.message: What can I do for you?

lines.originalLine: mes("- As you are overloaded with too many items, quest can't be continued.-");
lines.message: - As you are overloaded with too many items, quest can't be continued.-

lines.originalLine: mes("I will make a new registration for you.");
lines.message: I will make a new registration for you.

lines.originalLine: mes("You can choose the course freely and each course has individual features.");
lines.message: You can choose the course freely and each course has individual features.

lines.originalLine: mes("And this is the the basic equipment for the educational course.");
lines.message: And this is the the basic equipment for the educational course.

lines.originalLine: mes("Please make a good use of it.");
lines.message: Please make a good use of it.

lines.originalLine: mes("Be careful with it as it won't be provided again.");
lines.message: Be careful with it as it won't be provided again.

lines.originalLine: mes("It is your first step to be an adventurer that you have made a visit to us.");
lines.message: It is your first step to be an adventurer that you have made a visit to us.

lines.originalLine: mes("On our next meeting, I anticipate you will grow up a bit more.");
lines.message: On our next meeting, I anticipate you will grow up a bit more.

lines.originalLine: mes("One who is not a Novice can't attend the educational course.");
lines.message: One who is not a Novice can't attend the educational course.

lines.originalLine: mes("However, a part of the educational course except the character cultivation can be freely attended. So, you may look around the Academy and neighboring places.");
lines.message: However, a part of the educational course except the character cultivation can be freely attended. So, you may look around the Academy and neighboring places.

lines.originalLine: mes("The first floor is equipped with instructors that give you lessons on how the world works here in Rune Midgard.");
lines.message: The first floor is equipped with instructors that give you lessons on how the world works here in Rune Midgard.

lines.originalLine: mes("First of all, at the dispensary, you can learn how to recover your physical strength and learn a skill to heal your HP");
lines.message: First of all, at the dispensary, you can learn how to recover your physical strength and learn a skill to heal your HP

lines.originalLine: mes("At the armory, you can get simple training about battling monsters in Rune Midgard.");
lines.message: At the armory, you can get simple training about battling monsters in Rune Midgard.

lines.originalLine: mes("At the cafeteria, you can practice cooking and and will learn its many benefits.");
lines.message: At the cafeteria, you can practice cooking and and will learn its many benefits.

lines.originalLine: mes("At the 2nd floor, there are trainers that will teach you about the different job classes in the world.");
lines.message: At the 2nd floor, there are trainers that will teach you about the different job classes in the world.

lines.originalLine: mes("Listen to the trainers and decide for yourself which job suits your personal style.");
lines.message: Listen to the trainers and decide for yourself which job suits your personal style.

lines.originalLine: mes("This town is called 'Izlude' the satellite and port city of the Capital City of the Rune-Midgarts Kingdom Prontera.");
lines.message: This town is called 'Izlude' the satellite and port city of the Capital City of the Rune-Midgarts Kingdom Prontera.

lines.originalLine: mes("This town was re-organized to suit the education of Novices.");
lines.message: This town was re-organized to suit the education of Novices.

lines.originalLine: mes("Please find me, if you need anything else.");
lines.message: Please find me, if you need anything else.

lines.originalLine: mes("Left-Click your mouse on the name of the trainer you are looking for and I will give guide you to them.");
lines.message: Left-Click your mouse on the name of the trainer you are looking for and I will give guide you to them.

lines.originalLine: mes("<NAVI>[Therapist]<INFO>iz_ac01,59,43</INFO></NAVI>, status recovery trainer");
lines.message: <NAVI>[Therapist]<INFO>iz_ac01,59,43</INFO></NAVI>, status recovery trainer

lines.message: <NAVI>[Mounds]<INFO>izlude,96,125</INFO></NAVI> Enchanting Trainer.

lines.originalLine: mes("<NAVI>[Cream Puff]<INFO>iz_ac02,143,55</INFO></NAVI>, Class Aptitude Test.");
lines.message: <NAVI>[Cream Puff]<INFO>iz_ac02,143,55</INFO></NAVI>, Class Aptitude Test.

lines.originalLine: mes("Is that helpful?");
lines.message: Is that helpful?

lines.originalLine: mes("I believe you'll become nicer on our next meeting. Try your best~~~");
lines.message: I believe you'll become nicer on our next meeting. Try your best~~~

lines.originalLine: mes("Swordman Instructor <NAVI>[Adric]<INFO>iz_ac02,62,51</INFO></NAVI>");
lines.message: Swordman Instructor <NAVI>[Adric]<INFO>iz_ac02,62,51</INFO></NAVI>

lines.message: Archer Instructor <NAVI>[Marlbron]<INFO>iz_ac02,65,109</INFO></NAVI>

lines.message: Thief Instructor <NAVI>[Mayssel]<INFO>iz_ac02,52,136</INFO></NAVI>

lines.message: Merchant Instructor <NAVI>[Salim]<INFO>iz_ac02,50,169</INFO></NAVI>

lines.message: Taekwon Instructor <NAVI>[Arang]<INFO>iz_ac02,70,85</INFO></NAVI>

lines.originalLine: mes("[Mainz]");
lines.message: [Mainz]

lines.originalLine: mes("Ha ah....");
lines.message: Ha ah....

lines.originalLine: mes("What should I do with this lunchbox?");
lines.message: What should I do with this lunchbox?

lines.originalLine: mes("- Here, just moment!! -");
lines.message: - Here, just moment!! -

lines.originalLine: mes("- As you are overloaded with too many items in your inventory -");
lines.message: - As you are overloaded with too many items in your inventory -

lines.originalLine: mes("- You can't receive the items anymore -");
lines.message: - You can't receive the items anymore -

lines.originalLine: mes("- Let yourself enlightened -");
lines.message: - Let yourself enlightened -

lines.originalLine: mes("- and please try again -");
lines.message: - and please try again -

lines.originalLine: mes("Are you ready to learn about abnormal statuses? I promise that I won't trick you anymore. I am a ''trainer'' after all right?");
lines.message: Are you ready to learn about abnormal statuses? I promise that I won't trick you anymore. I am a ''trainer'' after all right?

lines.originalLine: mes("First of all, I'll tell you about <^FF0000Poison^000000>.");
lines.message: First of all, I'll tell you about <^FF0000Poison^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("As you already experienced, when you are poisoned, your body turns purple and you lose a little HP every second.");
lines.message: As you already experienced, when you are poisoned, your body turns purple and you lose a little HP every second.

lines.originalLine: mes("You can't lose HP forever so you won't die from poison.");
lines.message: You can't lose HP forever so you won't die from poison.

lines.originalLine: mes("Experiencing is believing! I will put you in a poisoned status.");
lines.message: Experiencing is believing! I will put you in a poisoned status.

lines.originalLine: mes("See what happens to you in the poisoned status.");
lines.message: See what happens to you in the poisoned status.

lines.originalLine: mes("You are- <^FF0000Poisoned^000000>.");
lines.message: You are- <^FF0000Poisoned^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("Did you see what is the poisoned status? After a certain period of time, you could be detoxicated, but if you're being attached, it is dangerous to expect being detoxicated naturally.");
lines.message: Did you see what is the poisoned status? After a certain period of time, you could be detoxicated, but if you're being attached, it is dangerous to expect being detoxicated naturally.

lines.originalLine: mes("Refer to the detoxicants such as <^0022FFGreen Herb^000000>, <^0022FFGreen Potion^000000>, <^0022FFPanacea^000000> and <^0022FFRoyal Jelly^000000>.");
lines.message: Refer to the detoxicants such as <^0022FFGreen Herb^000000>, <^0022FFGreen Potion^000000>, <^0022FFPanacea^000000> and <^0022FFRoyal Jelly^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("Next, I'll tell you about<^FF0000 Stun^000000.");
lines.message: Next, I'll tell you about<^FF0000 Stun^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("While in the Stun status, stars will circle around your head and you can't move basically you'll be ''defenseless''.");
lines.message: While in the Stun status, stars will circle around your head and you can't move basically you'll be ''defenseless''.

lines.originalLine: mes("As you are defenseless, you can't move, use skills, and use items.");
lines.message: As you are defenseless, you can't move, use skills, and use items.

lines.originalLine: mes("So, it is impossible to recover from it by yourself.");
lines.message: So, it is impossible to recover from it by yourself.

lines.originalLine: mes("The exceptional case is you can recover from it by the skill called <^0022FFGentle Touch-Cure^000000> if you are a Sura.");
lines.message: The exceptional case is you can recover from it by the skill called <^0022FFGentle Touch-Cure^000000> if you are a Sura.

lines.originalLine: mes("You can recover with skills such as the Priest's <^0022FFRecovery ^000000> or the Arch Bishop's <^0022FFLauda Ramus^000000>.");
lines.message: You can recover with skills such as the Priest's <^0022FFRecovery ^000000> or the Arch Bishop's <^0022FFLauda Ramus^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("Let me show you what will happen in the Stun status!");
lines.message: Let me show you what will happen in the Stun status!

lines.originalLine: mes("How was it?");
lines.message: How was it?

lines.originalLine: mes("Didn't you feel oppressed since you couldn't move?");
lines.message: Didn't you feel oppressed since you couldn't move?

lines.originalLine: mes("Imagine that you are in that status and monsters are rushing to you...");
lines.message: Imagine that you are in that status and monsters are rushing to you...

lines.originalLine: mes("Believe me it'll happen.");
lines.message: Believe me it'll happen.

lines.originalLine: mes("This time, I will teach you about <^FF0000Sleep^000000>.");
lines.message: This time, I will teach you about <^FF0000Sleep^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("In sleep status, you fall asleep with a <Zzz> popped up over your head.");
lines.message: In sleep status, you fall asleep with a <Zzz> popped up over your head.

lines.originalLine: mes("Same as the Stun status, you are defenseless, but the difference is you can recover from the enemy's attack.");
lines.message: Same as the Stun status, you are defenseless, but the difference is you can recover from the enemy's attack.

lines.originalLine: mes("But in sleep status, the possibility to be hit by ''Critical'' attacks from enemy's attack is increased, you are in danger and exposed a severe damage.");
lines.message: But in sleep status, the possibility to be hit by ''Critical'' attacks from enemy's attack is increased, you are in danger and exposed a severe damage.

lines.originalLine: mes("For your reference, recovery by yourself is impossible and is only possible with the <^0022FF Recovery ^000000>skill of a Priest.");
lines.message: For your reference, recovery by yourself is impossible and is only possible with the <^0022FF Recovery ^000000>skill of a Priest.

lines.originalLine: mes("Let me show you what will happen in the sleep status.");
lines.message: Let me show you what will happen in the sleep status.

lines.originalLine: mes("How was it? It isn't fun to imagine being asleep in front of a dangerous enemy is it?");
lines.message: How was it? It isn't fun to imagine being asleep in front of a dangerous enemy is it?

lines.originalLine: mes("Sleep is good for recovery but not necessarily good while you're in the middle of a battle.");
lines.message: Sleep is good for recovery but not necessarily good while you're in the middle of a battle.

lines.originalLine: mes("Lastly, I will teach you about  <^FF0000 Silence ^000000>.");
lines.message: Lastly, I will teach you about  <^FF0000 Silence ^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("In Silence status,  you can't use any magic skills and a <...> will appear above your head.");
lines.message: In Silence status,  you can't use any magic skills and a <...> will appear above your head.

lines.originalLine: mes("But all attacks are not impossible. Normal attacks can still be done while silenced.");
lines.message: But all attacks are not impossible. Normal attacks can still be done while silenced.

lines.originalLine: mes("In the silence status, you can merely still physically attack or recover by using potions.");
lines.message: In the silence status, you can merely still physically attack or recover by using potions.

lines.originalLine: mes("It's possible to recover with the items such as<^0022FF Green Herb^000000>, <^0022FFGreen Potion^000000>, <^0022FFPanacea^000000> and <^0022FFRoyal Jelly^000000>.");
lines.message: It's possible to recover with the items such as<^0022FF Green Herb^000000>, <^0022FFGreen Potion^000000>, <^0022FFPanacea^000000> and <^0022FFRoyal Jelly^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("Let me show you what will happen in sleep status.");
lines.message: Let me show you what will happen in sleep status.

lines.originalLine: mes("It's frustrating to not be able to use your skills right?");
lines.message: It's frustrating to not be able to use your skills right?

lines.originalLine: mes("Especially, when you are a high class depending upon the skills rather than physical attacks or in sleep status during the battle, you will be damaged severely.");
lines.message: Especially, when you are a high class depending upon the skills rather than physical attacks or in sleep status during the battle, you will be damaged severely.

lines.originalLine: mes("In addtion, there are other statuses like Darkness, Frozen, Curse, Stone, Confusion etc, but I can let you experience all of them.");
lines.message: In addtion, there are other statuses like Darkness, Frozen, Curse, Stone, Confusion etc, but I can let you experience all of them.

lines.originalLine: mes("I hope this was helpful for you to experience some of the things that you will see out in the world.");
lines.message: I hope this was helpful for you to experience some of the things that you will see out in the world.

lines.originalLine: mes("Whenever you want to experience an abnormal status, please come to me.");
lines.message: Whenever you want to experience an abnormal status, please come to me.

lines.originalLine: mes("As an apology for the lunchbox matter, I will give you a small gift.");
lines.message: As an apology for the lunchbox matter, I will give you a small gift.

lines.originalLine: mes("Wish you have good luck in your adventures!");
lines.message: Wish you have good luck in your adventures!

lines.originalLine: mes("Hey, you there!");
lines.message: Hey, you there!

lines.originalLine: mes("By any chance, are you a training beginner?");
lines.message: By any chance, are you a training beginner?

lines.originalLine: mes("I'm Trainer Mainz; and I'm in charge of education at this Academy.");
lines.message: I'm Trainer Mainz; and I'm in charge of education at this Academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("Which course?");
lines.message: Which course?

lines.originalLine: mes("It is not important so I will let you know later.");
lines.message: It is not important so I will let you know later.

lines.originalLine: mes("You must be very exhausted after having to read and learn so much right?");
lines.message: You must be very exhausted after having to read and learn so much right?

lines.originalLine: mes("Of course, you are... Oh, you poor thing.");
lines.message: Of course, you are... Oh, you poor thing.

lines.originalLine: mes("There's a person who can help you when you need it.");
lines.message: There's a person who can help you when you need it.

lines.originalLine: mes("Do you know who is it?");
lines.message: Do you know who is it?

lines.originalLine: mes("That's me!");
lines.message: That's me!

lines.originalLine: mes("What does that mean?");
lines.message: What does that mean?

lines.originalLine: mes("It means I have prepared a special gift just for your exhausted self!");
lines.message: It means I have prepared a special gift just for your exhausted self!

lines.originalLine: mes("A lunchbox for you!!! Hahahaha!");
lines.message: A lunchbox for you!!! Hahahaha!

lines.originalLine: mes("Since I'm not the one who made it don't worry.");
lines.message: Since I'm not the one who made it don't worry.

lines.originalLine: mes("My beloved wife prepared it. So, just be my guest and enjoy!");
lines.message: My beloved wife prepared it. So, just be my guest and enjoy!

lines.originalLine: mes("You don't want to have this lunchbox? I guess it's your loss then.");
lines.message: You don't want to have this lunchbox? I guess it's your loss then.

lines.originalLine: mes("Should I just take it for myself then?");
lines.message: Should I just take it for myself then?

lines.originalLine: mes("Yes... You made a right decision.");
lines.message: Yes... You made a right decision.

lines.originalLine: mes("Please keep in mind that I really wanted to have it but since you look exhausted I offered it to you first!");
lines.message: Please keep in mind that I really wanted to have it but since you look exhausted I offered it to you first!

lines.originalLine: mes("- You open the lunchbox and there is some type of food inside -");
lines.message: - You open the lunchbox and there is some type of food inside -

lines.originalLine: mes("Wahahahat! Don't hesitate and just take it!");
lines.message: Wahahahat! Don't hesitate and just take it!

lines.originalLine: mes("It will refresh you from your fatigue!");
lines.message: It will refresh you from your fatigue!

lines.originalLine: mes("Eat it~~ Eat it~~");
lines.message: Eat it~~ Eat it~~

lines.originalLine: mes("- Since you're tired and starved you're obliged to take the box -");
lines.message: - Since you're tired and starved you're obliged to take the box -

lines.originalLine: mes("- You eat the food and suddenly feel a sharp pain in your stomach. Your vision seems to be blurry too -");
lines.message: - You eat the food and suddenly feel a sharp pain in your stomach. Your vision seems to be blurry too -

lines.originalLine: mes("Oh... what happened to you?");
lines.message: Oh... what happened to you?

lines.originalLine: mes("You don't look too good!");
lines.message: You don't look too good!

lines.originalLine: mes("Oh, man...");
lines.message: Oh, man...

lines.originalLine: mes("I think you've been poisoned.");
lines.message: I think you've been poisoned.

lines.originalLine: mes("I will give you an antidote. You might get better if you take it.");
lines.message: I will give you an antidote. You might get better if you take it.

lines.originalLine: mes("- You reluctantly take the antidote -");
lines.message: - You reluctantly take the antidote -

lines.originalLine: mes("Well, how the heck were you poisoned?");
lines.message: Well, how the heck were you poisoned?

lines.originalLine: mes("By the way, I heard that there's a ghost wandering around the Royal Criatura Academy.");
lines.message: By the way, I heard that there's a ghost wandering around the Royal Criatura Academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("I think the ghost must have poisoned you.");
lines.message: I think the ghost must have poisoned you.

lines.originalLine: mes("- You roll your eyes at Mainz -");
lines.message: - You roll your eyes at Mainz -

lines.originalLine: mes("- Mainz turns his head as if he doesn't notice -");
lines.message: - Mainz turns his head as if he doesn't notice -

lines.originalLine: mes("Ehem! Anyway, I am sorry.");
lines.message: Ehem! Anyway, I am sorry.

lines.originalLine: mes("Please understand there is no malice.");
lines.message: Please understand there is no malice.

lines.originalLine: mes("All of these are for you...");
lines.message: All of these are for you...

lines.originalLine: mes("Want to know what I mean?");
lines.message: Want to know what I mean?

lines.originalLine: mes("There are various kinds of monsters on the Rune Midgard continent. And some of them can poison you or put you in abnormal conditions.");
lines.message: There are various kinds of monsters on the Rune Midgard continent. And some of them can poison you or put you in abnormal conditions.

lines.originalLine: mes("Usually, anybody is too embarrassed to admit being poisoned without knowing.  I just did it on purpose to let you have the experience in case it happens out in the real world.");
lines.message: Usually, anybody is too embarrassed to admit being poisoned without knowing.  I just did it on purpose to let you have the experience in case it happens out in the real world.

lines.originalLine: mes("Understand that I didn't intend to pass my wife's lunchbox as if it was a present. It was just another lesson from the Criatura Academy.");
lines.message: Understand that I didn't intend to pass my wife's lunchbox as if it was a present. It was just another lesson from the Criatura Academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("As an apology, I would like to inform you of several abnormal statuses you might experience in the Rune Midgard Continent.");
lines.message: As an apology, I would like to inform you of several abnormal statuses you might experience in the Rune Midgard Continent.

lines.originalLine: mes("Don't decline it! Being ready to learn so speak to me again.");
lines.message: Don't decline it! Being ready to learn so speak to me again.

lines.originalLine: mes("Are you here for an explanation about the abnormal statuses? What makes you anxious?");
lines.message: Are you here for an explanation about the abnormal statuses? What makes you anxious?

lines.originalLine: mes("I'll tell you about <^FF0000Poison^000000>.");
lines.message: I'll tell you about <^FF0000Poison^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("What else are you anxious about?");
lines.message: What else are you anxious about?

lines.originalLine: mes("I'll tell you about <^FF0000Stun^000000>.");
lines.message: I'll tell you about <^FF0000Stun^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("I will teach you about <^FF0000Sleep^000000>.");
lines.message: I will teach you about <^FF0000Sleep^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("I will teach you about  <^FF0000 Silence ^000000>.");
lines.message: I will teach you about  <^FF0000 Silence ^000000>.

lines.originalLine: mes("Do you have any more questions?");
lines.message: Do you have any more questions?

lines.originalLine: mes("If you don't have any more questions, would you please have my lunchbox on behalf of me?");
lines.message: If you don't have any more questions, would you please have my lunchbox on behalf of me?

lines.originalLine: mes("No?");
lines.message: No?

lines.originalLine: mes("Haaaaa...");
lines.message: Haaaaa...

lines.originalLine: mes("[Odd Novice]");
lines.message: [Odd Novice]

lines.originalLine: mes("Ahaaa~~ sticking at the dispensary.");
lines.message: Ahaaa~~ sticking at the dispensary.

lines.originalLine: mes("Playing hooky is cool and awesome.");
lines.message: Playing hooky is cool and awesome.

lines.originalLine: mes("while XXXXXX, but what are you?");
lines.message: while XXXXXX, but what are you?

lines.originalLine: mes("Are you the same kind of XXXXX?");
lines.message: Are you the same kind of XXXXX?

lines.originalLine: mes("Hmmm... you look like you have some talent.");
lines.message: Hmmm... you look like you have some talent.

lines.originalLine: mes("Being in a good mood, shall I show you something newfangled?");
lines.message: Being in a good mood, shall I show you something newfangled?

lines.originalLine: mes("I may look ordinary to you but I have a newfangled talent.");
lines.message: I may look ordinary to you but I have a newfangled talent.

lines.originalLine: mes("Not my fault, if you are shocked at seeing it.");
lines.message: Not my fault, if you are shocked at seeing it.

lines.originalLine: mes("OK. Where should I start?");
lines.message: OK. Where should I start?

lines.originalLine: mes("First, Bash!");
lines.message: First, Bash!

lines.originalLine: mes("Hehehe.. Surprised?");
lines.message: Hehehe.. Surprised?

lines.originalLine: mes("I'm just pretending...");
lines.message: I'm just pretending...

lines.originalLine: mes("It's not a real punch.");
lines.message: It's not a real punch.

lines.originalLine: mes("Looks like you were surprised!");
lines.message: Looks like you were surprised!

lines.originalLine: mes("Just keep calm");
lines.message: Just keep calm

lines.originalLine: mes("and have a potion");
lines.message: and have a potion

lines.originalLine: mes("But that's not the last of it.");
lines.message: But that's not the last of it.

lines.originalLine: mes("I have stolen one thread of your hair.");
lines.message: I have stolen one thread of your hair.

lines.originalLine: mes("I don't believe in Voodooism.");
lines.message: I don't believe in Voodooism.

lines.originalLine: mes("Regard it as your luck.");
lines.message: Regard it as your luck.

lines.originalLine: mes("The last one is a flame, to say the least!");
lines.message: The last one is a flame, to say the least!

lines.originalLine: mes("How about it? Newfangled.");
lines.message: How about it? Newfangled.

lines.originalLine: mes("Idling away too long,");
lines.message: Idling away too long,

lines.originalLine: mes("All the skills learnt over your shoulder could be used.");
lines.message: All the skills learnt over your shoulder could be used.

lines.originalLine: mes("Ugh, all my SP is gone...");
lines.message: Ugh, all my SP is gone...

lines.originalLine: mes("and wasted... I am tired.");
lines.message: and wasted... I am tired.

lines.originalLine: mes("I am going back to rest.");
lines.message: I am going back to rest.

lines.originalLine: mes("So long, Bye-bye~~ Don't bother me anymore.");
lines.message: So long, Bye-bye~~ Don't bother me anymore.

lines.originalLine: mes("What? You, disturbing me.");
lines.message: What? You, disturbing me.

lines.originalLine: mes("Get away from me kid you're botherin' me.");
lines.message: Get away from me kid you're botherin' me.

lines.originalLine: mes("Me? I'm Novice.");
lines.message: Me? I'm Novice.

lines.originalLine: mes("What? Strange? You seein' me for the first time?");
lines.message: What? Strange? You seein' me for the first time?

lines.originalLine: mes("If I look shabby, you should go find a mirror.");
lines.message: If I look shabby, you should go find a mirror.

lines.message: If you eat a dedicated meal, you can ^0000cd raise a specific stats^000000 and additionally, ^0000cdrecover your health^000000, so what's the reason not to cook?

lines.message: Storage service is a place where you can safely store your items.

lines.message: Your items can be accessed by all characters in your account.

lines.message: To use the storage, you need to be over Novice Job Level 6 and higher.

lines.message: You can even buy Kafra Cards from the Item Mall to open storage from anywhere!

lines.message: Do you want to use the storage?

lines.message: To use the storage, you need to be raised the beginner level 6 and higher.

lines.message: You need 500 zeny to use the storage~!

lines.message: Teleport service is a service that sends you to various locations throughout Rune Midgard.

lines.message: Different Kafra Employees have different teleport locations to send you to so you need to talk to them to find out where they're teleporting to.

lines.message: Ok, so for educational purposes I'm offering a free teleport service here at the Academy.

lines.originalLine: mes("Why don't you try it out?~!");
lines.message: Why don't you try it out?~!

lines.message: You afraid of having your cells spliced or something? Don't worry this is perfectly safe~!

lines.message: This is an essential service~

lines.originalLine: mes("So, you better get used to it ok?");
lines.message: So, you better get used to it ok?

lines.message: This will take you to the outside of the Criatura Academy, is that ok?

lines.message: If you want to come back to the academy, find the entrance to the north of Izlude.

lines.message: Pushcart service is used for those who have the job ^8B4513Merchant^000000.

lines.message: To rent a Pushcart Merchants pay a small zeny fee and that's it.

lines.message: If you aren't a Merchant class or if you haven't learned the Cart Skill then you can't use this Kafra service.

lines.message: Among the other services we provide, there is a Customer point service system from Kafra!

lines.message: Every time you use a Kafra Service you get Special Reserve Points~

lines.message: You can use these points at the Kafra Headquarters in Aldebaran to trade for certain items.

lines.message: Here, I'll show you how many Special Reserve Points you currently have.

lines.message: Please check your accumulated customer points~!

lines.message: convenient services to see the benefits of our rewards program.

lines.message: Our Kafra service is doing our best to give you the best satisfaction that you deserve as a customer.

lines.originalLine: mes("Thanks for using us.");
lines.message: Thanks for using us.

lines.originalLine: mes("First, you need to complete your^8B4513 registration^000000 at the Academy's front desk.");
lines.message: First, you need to complete your^8B4513 registration^000000 at the Academy's front desk.

lines.originalLine: mes("If you go to the first floor,");
lines.message: If you go to the first floor,

lines.originalLine: mes("there'll be someone");
lines.message: there'll be someone

lines.originalLine: mes("to take your registration.");
lines.message: to take your registration.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Wedding Secretary]");
lines.message: [Wedding Secretary]

lines.originalLine: mes("You are the just a beginner.");
lines.message: You are the just a beginner.

lines.originalLine: mes("Everything looks new and unfamiliar, doesn't it? Isn't it all exiciting?");
lines.message: Everything looks new and unfamiliar, doesn't it? Isn't it all exiciting?

lines.originalLine: mes("What can be a more exciting start than a marriage in your life?");
lines.message: What can be a more exciting start than a marriage in your life?

lines.originalLine: mes("Are you in love?");
lines.message: Are you in love?

lines.originalLine: mes("I am the Wedding Secretary sent here for those people wanting to join their lives to another.");
lines.message: I am the Wedding Secretary sent here for those people wanting to join their lives to another.

lines.originalLine: mes("Please ask anything you are concerned with about marriage!");
lines.message: Please ask anything you are concerned with about marriage!

lines.originalLine: mes("Concluding the ceremony between two lovers is really the most beautiful and special event in one's life.");
lines.message: Concluding the ceremony between two lovers is really the most beautiful and special event in one's life.

lines.originalLine: mes("However, being together requires several procedures.");
lines.message: However, being together requires several procedures.

lines.originalLine: mes("First, the two of you wishing to get married have to be at least base level ^0000cd45^000000 or higher, meaning  you should be at the level responsible for your life and your finances.");
lines.message: First, the two of you wishing to get married have to be at least base level ^0000cd45^000000 or higher, meaning  you should be at the level responsible for your life and your finances.

lines.originalLine: mes("Next, you need to prepare some tokens of appreciation. Men need a ^0000cdTuxedo^000000 Ladies need a ^0000cdWedding Dress^000000 and both need to have ^0000cdDiamond Ring^000000s as the symbol of everlasting love.");
lines.message: Next, you need to prepare some tokens of appreciation. Men need a ^0000cdTuxedo^000000 Ladies need a ^0000cdWedding Dress^000000 and both need to have ^0000cdDiamond Ring^000000s as the symbol of everlasting love.

lines.originalLine: mes("You will also need to provide a fee of ^0000cd1 million Zeny^000000.");
lines.message: You will also need to provide a fee of ^0000cd1 million Zeny^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("Having prepared all of these things, you must create a party with just the two of you and go to the ^0000cdProntera Cathedral^000000.");
lines.message: Having prepared all of these things, you must create a party with just the two of you and go to the ^0000cdProntera Cathedral^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("There, another  ^0000cdWedding Secretary^000000 like me is wating for you. When you speak to her, she will give more details of what to do.");
lines.message: There, another  ^0000cdWedding Secretary^000000 like me is wating for you. When you speak to her, she will give more details of what to do.

lines.originalLine: mes("I hope that you will meet a great fiance and enjoy a happy marriage!");
lines.message: I hope that you will meet a great fiance and enjoy a happy marriage!

lines.originalLine: mes("To say the least, the benefit of marriage is being together forever!");
lines.message: To say the least, the benefit of marriage is being together forever!

lines.originalLine: mes("After the wedding ceremony, you can enjoy a sweet honeymoon at the ^0000cdJawaii^000000 resort only for you.");
lines.message: After the wedding ceremony, you can enjoy a sweet honeymoon at the ^0000cdJawaii^000000 resort only for you.

lines.originalLine: mes("And, upon marriage you will both get a ^0000cd special skill^000000.");
lines.message: And, upon marriage you will both get a ^0000cd special skill^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("Two of these skills are called ^0000cdLoving Touch^000000 and ^0000cdUndying Love^000000 which are used to sacrifice HP or SP and send it to your partner.");
lines.message: Two of these skills are called ^0000cdLoving Touch^000000 and ^0000cdUndying Love^000000 which are used to sacrifice HP or SP and send it to your partner.

lines.originalLine: mes("But among them, the skill called ^0000cdRomantic Rendezvous^000000 is the most romantic one, enabling you to summon your partner to you from anywhere in the world.");
lines.message: But among them, the skill called ^0000cdRomantic Rendezvous^000000 is the most romantic one, enabling you to summon your partner to you from anywhere in the world.

lines.originalLine: mes("Aren't these skill great? Don't you want to get married right now?");
lines.message: Aren't these skill great? Don't you want to get married right now?

lines.originalLine: mes("Being together is wonderful but people without experience of it in the past couldn't understand the full Euphoria of being a parent.");
lines.message: Being together is wonderful but people without experience of it in the past couldn't understand the full Euphoria of being a parent.

lines.originalLine: mes("Married couple can adopt other characters as their children.");
lines.message: Married couple can adopt other characters as their children.

lines.originalLine: mes("^0000cdKids of extended jobs such as Taekwon boy/girl, Gunslinger or Ninja can't be adopted^000000.");
lines.message: ^0000cdKids of extended jobs such as Taekwon boy/girl, Gunslinger or Ninja can't be adopted^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("And any prospecting parents need to be at least base level  ^0000cd70^000000, meaning you should be at the level responsible enough to be parents.");
lines.message: And any prospecting parents need to be at least base level  ^0000cd70^000000, meaning you should be at the level responsible enough to be parents.

lines.originalLine: mes("Having made a family, ^0000cdaSkill to be used among the family^000000 will be earned.");
lines.message: Having made a family, ^0000cdaSkill to be used among the family^000000 will be earned.

lines.message: There is another skill enables you to concrete your bond such as being able to summon your child when you miss them or not losing your earned level if you die during battle.

lines.message: Cute charms coming from your kid is a bonus~

lines.message: Your mother didn't teach you right?

lines.message: Once you transcend, you can go back to the base level Novice.

lines.message: It is very hard to start your adventure again. However, there is a merit to the hardship.

lines.message: Adventurers with the 2nd job or can be transferred to the 3rd job class once gaining the base level 99 and the job level more than 50.

lines.message: ^FF0000I should look for somebody to heal me nearby.^000000.

lines.message: Why are you carrying so much with you? Unload it somewhere and come back.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Marlbron]");
lines.message: [Marlbron]

lines.originalLine: mes("Emmm. This is?");
lines.message: Emmm. This is?

lines.originalLine: mes("You were never trained by me.");
lines.message: You were never trained by me.

lines.originalLine: mes("Then, I have no interest in you.");
lines.message: Then, I have no interest in you.

lines.originalLine: mes("I see you received a complete education in Payon.");
lines.message: I see you received a complete education in Payon.

lines.originalLine: mes("Then again... you may want to learn more.");
lines.message: Then again... you may want to learn more.

lines.originalLine: mes("Either way, there is nothing I can teach you.");
lines.message: Either way, there is nothing I can teach you.

lines.originalLine: mes("Ah~ You've become a skilled Archer.");
lines.message: Ah~ You've become a skilled Archer.

lines.originalLine: mes("The difference is great now compared to when you were a novice!");
lines.message: The difference is great now compared to when you were a novice!

lines.originalLine: mes("Because of my teachings, you have grown very fast!");
lines.message: Because of my teachings, you have grown very fast!

lines.message: Sniff sniff! It is the smell of a novice!

lines.message: Nice to meet you!!!

lines.message: What brought you here?

lines.originalLine: mes("I can guess most, but hehehehe~~");
lines.message: I can guess most, but hehehehe~~

lines.originalLine: mes("Please feel comfortable and tell me everything you want!");
lines.message: Please feel comfortable and tell me everything you want!

lines.originalLine: mes("What? Bored? Play with you?");
lines.message: What? Bored? Play with you?

lines.originalLine: mes("You think this is just some kids playground?");
lines.message: You think this is just some kids playground?

lines.originalLine: mes("If you are bored, walk around and punch a monster in the face and see what happens.");
lines.message: If you are bored, walk around and punch a monster in the face and see what happens.

lines.originalLine: mes("Oh dear~ another sheep here to get a free lesson from me.");
lines.message: Oh dear~ another sheep here to get a free lesson from me.

lines.message: The main point of Archers is to use bows to attack enemies quickly from a long distance.

lines.originalLine: mes("Only problem is they are physically weak.");
lines.message: Only problem is they are physically weak.

lines.originalLine: mes("But, it doesn't matter if they are trained correctly.");
lines.message: But, it doesn't matter if they are trained correctly.

lines.originalLine: mes("What do you want to know about an Archer? I will tell you everything~");
lines.message: What do you want to know about an Archer? I will tell you everything~

lines.originalLine: mes("With my full explanation~, you can be an excellent one.");
lines.message: With my full explanation~, you can be an excellent one.

lines.originalLine: mes("Are you curious about the Archer's stats?");
lines.message: Are you curious about the Archer's stats?

lines.originalLine: mes("Do you know the most necessary stats for Archers?");
lines.message: Do you know the most necessary stats for Archers?

lines.originalLine: mes("That is ^0000cdDex^000000.");
lines.message: That is ^0000cdDex^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("To raise up the attacking power in other jobs, Str should be raised but Archers vary in accordance with their Dex figures.");
lines.message: To raise up the attacking power in other jobs, Str should be raised but Archers vary in accordance with their Dex figures.

lines.message: Here is a simple question! What is the name of the stat determining the Archer's attacking power?

lines.originalLine: mes("You are correct~~");
lines.message: You are correct~~

lines.message: If you want to know more about the role of other stats, ^0000cdopen the status window by pressing ALT+Q.^000000

lines.originalLine: mes("If you are curious about stats except Dex, you can check it out.");
lines.message: If you are curious about stats except Dex, you can check it out.

lines.message: If you have a job later, you can reset the stats anyway.

lines.message: Hey, just click this and that!

lines.message: Hmm. You are interested in skills? Then, let's study ^0000cd skill^000000s.

lines.message: I thought you would better experience the skill than talking, so I prepared the experience of the archer's skill in a manual.

lines.message: Archer have a lot of very useful skills.

lines.message: But regretfully as most of them are skills useful only with arrows and bows, you can't experience them.

lines.message: There is a useful skill without a bow... Called ^0000cdImprove Concentration^000000

lines.message: At the same time, it will reveal hidden enemies nearby.

lines.message: To use skills, click the skill icon on the skill window. Then drag and register it on the ^0000cdshortcut window^000000 to use conveniently.

lines.message: Will you go and find a hunting teacher on the 1st floor? if you do not want, then no need.

lines.originalLine: mes("But he may train you with a lot of useful hunting skills for you.");
lines.message: But he may train you with a lot of useful hunting skills for you.

lines.message: <NAVI>^4D4DFF[Battle Trainer Subino]^000000<INFO>iz_ac01,59,83,</INFO></NAVI>

lines.message: You may visit him.

lines.message: Do you want to become an^0000cd Archer^000000?

lines.message: It hasn't been a long time since we met together. But I am sad about saying good bye to you.

lines.message: Let me check a little while, before you change your job you have to be at job level 10.

lines.message: Change conditions satisfied!!

lines.message: Do you really want to become an Archer?

lines.message: First, let me explain some things to you about the Job Change.

lines.message: An Archer's hometown is ^0000cdPayon^000000); Which has a very long history.

lines.message: When you are feeling fatigued, you can go there.

lines.message: You will be given a warm hometown welcome.

lines.message: The Archers Guild is located to the ^0000cdNorth of Payon Archer Village^000000.

lines.message: I will take you to the gates of Payon.

lines.message: I would love to accompany you the rest of the way, but you must do this alone.

lines.message: I'll give you the directions which you must remember.

lines.message: Here is where I will send you to.

lines.message: You will reach the village of Payon.

lines.message: Follow the direction of the ^0000cdRed Arrow^000000, you will enter ^0000cdArcher Village^000000.

lines.message: Once you get there, make your way to the ^0000cdCircled Area^000000. Here you will find the ^0000cdArcher Job Change Guild^000000.

lines.message: Got it? Easy to find, right?

lines.message: Due to satellite navigation, you shouldn't worry about getting lost.

lines.message: However, if you are still worried, you can ask the local ^0000cdGuide^000000 where to go.

lines.message: You can find me after your visit to the guild.

lines.message: Now then, I wish you success in becoming an Archer. Until next time!

lines.message: Yes, come back and see me after reconsideration.

lines.message: Hmmm. You are a little bit short of Job Level.

lines.message: Are you coming back after more training?

lines.message: Visit <NAVI>^4D4DFF[Battle Trainer Subino]^000000<INFO>iz_ac01,59,83,</INFO></NAVI>

lines.message: at Armory on the 1st floor.

lines.message: Why are you still here? Are you not going to become an Archer?

lines.message: Are you going to pursue a different job?

lines.message: Well? How is it being an Archer?

lines.message: The student has surpassed the teacher, as the saying goes.

lines.message: You don't seem to be fully registered at the Academy yet.

lines.message: Did you directly come here without the entrance application for Critura Academy yet?

lines.message: Why are you of a different job snooping around here?

lines.message: You want to become a swordsman?

lines.message: Fight on the frontline with large swords,

lines.message: Bringing victory and with a high defense to protect your comrades.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Refinery Owner Han]");
lines.message: [Refinery Owner Han]

lines.originalLine: mes("Hello? My name is Han to lead the next generation of refining culture in Rune Midgard.");
lines.message: Hello? My name is Han to lead the next generation of refining culture in Rune Midgard.

lines.originalLine: mes("Entering this market lately, if I don't have old customers, it is not easy to operate. So, I do the advertising by myself.");
lines.message: Entering this market lately, if I don't have old customers, it is not easy to operate. So, I do the advertising by myself.

lines.originalLine: mes("Are you interested in ^3E86C3refining^000000 to make your items strong?");
lines.message: Are you interested in ^3E86C3refining^000000 to make your items strong?

lines.originalLine: mes("Ah, I am sorry. I caught a busy man.");
lines.message: Ah, I am sorry. I caught a busy man.

lines.originalLine: mes("Refining means to strengthen your equipments with ^3E86C3rare metal^000000 obtainable from monsters and so on.");
lines.message: Refining means to strengthen your equipments with ^3E86C3rare metal^000000 obtainable from monsters and so on.

lines.originalLine: mes("If weapons are refined, their attacking power increases. If shields are refined, their defensive power increases and helps to reduce pain against monster's hits on you.");
lines.message: If weapons are refined, their attacking power increases. If shields are refined, their defensive power increases and helps to reduce pain against monster's hits on you.

lines.originalLine: mes("So you kind of get the jist of it right?");
lines.message: So you kind of get the jist of it right?

lines.originalLine: mes("Yes, that's it. Refining is good but it can get addicting.");
lines.message: Yes, that's it. Refining is good but it can get addicting.

lines.originalLine: mes("I don't usually do it, but will give you a special chance to experience refining.");
lines.message: I don't usually do it, but will give you a special chance to experience refining.

lines.originalLine: mes("Whatever 1st level weapon level can be used it doesn't matter! If you use the ^3E86C3refining machine Wagjak^000000 over there!!");
lines.message: Whatever 1st level weapon level can be used it doesn't matter! If you use the ^3E86C3refining machine Wagjak^000000 over there!!

lines.originalLine: mes("^I will give you ^FD4F02just! one refining service free of charge.^000000.");
lines.message: ^I will give you ^FD4F02just! one refining service free of charge.^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("Hey I need to make a living you know! Don't go telling everyone I'm doing this for free ok?");
lines.message: Hey I need to make a living you know! Don't go telling everyone I'm doing this for free ok?

lines.originalLine: mes("You haven't used the refining machine Wagjak.");
lines.message: You haven't used the refining machine Wagjak.

lines.originalLine: mes("The refining machine Wagjak is a machine I made after 8 years of research.");
lines.message: The refining machine Wagjak is a machine I made after 8 years of research.

lines.originalLine: mes("I made it for more precious refining. It is my personal refining machine. Well, thanks to it, I have made several contracts.");
lines.message: I made it for more precious refining. It is my personal refining machine. Well, thanks to it, I have made several contracts.

lines.originalLine: mes("The name doesn't mean anything it's just a name. Wagjak! What a weird name right?");
lines.message: The name doesn't mean anything it's just a name. Wagjak! What a weird name right?

lines.originalLine: mes("Absolutely!");
lines.message: Absolutely!

lines.originalLine: mes("But I subscribe to the idea that seeing is believing... You know what I mean? Try it out yourself instead of asking questions.");
lines.message: But I subscribe to the idea that seeing is believing... You know what I mean? Try it out yourself instead of asking questions.

lines.originalLine: mes("Ohoh... as you don't have a service coupon.. You may have already used Wagjak...");
lines.message: Ohoh... as you don't have a service coupon.. You may have already used Wagjak...

lines.message: Yes, yes, we have... Safety refining indications and refining price... such small things...

lines.message: I recommend you visit and listen to Mr. Tadde about weapon levels and safe refining.

lines.message: Did you get a good lesson? Did he explain it well enough?

lines.originalLine: mes("Welcome. The owner told me to explain to you about ^3E86C3the weapon levels^000000 and ^3E86C3safety refining.^000000.");
lines.message: Welcome. The owner told me to explain to you about ^3E86C3the weapon levels^000000 and ^3E86C3safety refining.^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("In fact, it is better to get to know while questing yourself. But anyway if you have any questions, please ask to me.");
lines.message: In fact, it is better to get to know while questing yourself. But anyway if you have any questions, please ask to me.

lines.originalLine: mes("Weapons have levels, whereas Armors don't. The more ^3E86C3upscale a weapon^000000 is, the higher the weapon level is.");
lines.message: Weapons have levels, whereas Armors don't. The more ^3E86C3upscale a weapon^000000 is, the higher the weapon level is.

lines.originalLine: mes("That means ^A20B09the upscale weapons are more difficult to obtain.^000000.");
lines.message: That means ^A20B09the upscale weapons are more difficult to obtain.^000000.

lines.originalLine: mes("Considering the customers coming to refine, there are more for level 1 and 2 weapons than for level 3 and 4 weapons.");
lines.message: Considering the customers coming to refine, there are more for level 1 and 2 weapons than for level 3 and 4 weapons.

lines.originalLine: mes("Safety refining differs from the levels of Armor or weapon, so basically each level has a ^3E86C3different safe upgrade level.^000000");
lines.message: Safety refining differs from the levels of Armor or weapon, so basically each level has a ^3E86C3different safe upgrade level.^000000

lines.originalLine: mes("Level 1 weapons are safe when refined up to ^A20B09+7^000000. The lower the level of the weapon is, the higher the possible refining level.");
lines.message: Level 1 weapons are safe when refined up to ^A20B09+7^000000. The lower the level of the weapon is, the higher the possible refining level.

lines.originalLine: mes("Of course, it has stronger effect than level 1 weapon.");
lines.message: Of course, it has stronger effect than level 1 weapon.

lines.originalLine: mes("Level 2 weapons are safe when refined up to ^A20B09+6^000000, even though refining figure is lower than level 1 weapon.");
lines.message: Level 2 weapons are safe when refined up to ^A20B09+6^000000, even though refining figure is lower than level 1 weapon.

lines.originalLine: mes("Level 3 weapons are safe when refined up to ^A20B09+5^000000. Simply speaking, it looks like the safety refining goes down by 1 according to each weapon level.");
lines.message: Level 3 weapons are safe when refined up to ^A20B09+5^000000. Simply speaking, it looks like the safety refining goes down by 1 according to each weapon level.

lines.originalLine: mes("The higher the weapon is, the increasing effect of +1 becomes(higher as well.");
lines.message: The higher the weapon is, the increasing effect of +1 becomes(higher as well.

lines.originalLine: mes("Level 4 weapons are safe up to ^A20B09+4^000000. Numbers of level 4 weapons are so rare that not so many customers bring them here.");
lines.message: Level 4 weapons are safe up to ^A20B09+4^000000. Numbers of level 4 weapons are so rare that not so many customers bring them here.

lines.originalLine: mes("As it is one of the most luxurious weapons, the effect of refining is the strongest.");
lines.message: As it is one of the most luxurious weapons, the effect of refining is the strongest.

lines.originalLine: mes("Armors are safe when refined up to^A20B09+4^000000, just like a level 4 weapon.");
lines.message: Armors are safe when refined up to^A20B09+4^000000, just like a level 4 weapon.

lines.originalLine: mes("As most refiners are used to making weapons it's hard for them to safely upgrade armors.");
lines.message: As most refiners are used to making weapons it's hard for them to safely upgrade armors.

lines.originalLine: mes("You look like you've had enough explanations about the safety refining.");
