lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Perhaps, are you here to learn about enchanting? I will kindly explain you about it.");
lines.message: Perhaps, are you here to learn about enchanting? I will kindly explain you about it.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("Socket enchant is the skill to make card slots appear in Weapon or Armor.");
lines.message: Socket enchant is the skill to make card slots appear in Weapon or Armor.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("When you meet the Seyablem and Leyablem brothers around the towns of Rune Midgard they can help you with this service.");
lines.message: When you meet the Seyablem and Leyablem brothers around the towns of Rune Midgard they can help you with this service.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("If they fail to put a new slot in your item say farewell to it...");
lines.message: If they fail to put a new slot in your item say farewell to it...

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("It's usually a good idea to have more than 1 item to add a slot to because it can fail a lot sometimes.");
lines.message: It's usually a good idea to have more than 1 item to add a slot to because it can fail a lot sometimes.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("Hidden enchant means to put enchanted gems into the hidden slots of an item.");
lines.message: Hidden enchant means to put enchanted gems into the hidden slots of an item.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("You have to be wearing the item that is being enchanted as it uses the wearers fortune as the success rate.");
lines.message: You have to be wearing the item that is being enchanted as it uses the wearers fortune as the success rate.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("Many places are providing the various hidden enchant service in different ways, if you have time, please visit one of them.");
lines.message: Many places are providing the various hidden enchant service in different ways, if you have time, please visit one of them.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("News? Enchant association doesn't have a big issue going on.");
lines.message: News? Enchant association doesn't have a big issue going on.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("Ah!! I remember that Almond J sent with me from Izlude branch wanted to do advertising...");
lines.message: Ah!! I remember that Almond J sent with me from Izlude branch wanted to do advertising...

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("He drafted the initiative for the free service of hidden enchant to the beginner's weapons. I approved it as it looked a good idea.");
lines.message: He drafted the initiative for the free service of hidden enchant to the beginner's weapons. I approved it as it looked a good idea.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("What? If you have a beginners weapon, it may not hurt to try it.");
lines.message: What? If you have a beginners weapon, it may not hurt to try it.

lines.originalLine: // 				mes("Come to me whenever you have a question about the enchant association.");
lines.message: Come to me whenever you have a question about the enchant association.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("[Almond J]");
lines.message: [Almond J]

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Hello, I am Almon J of the enchant association.~");
lines.message: Hello, I am Almon J of the enchant association.~

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("If you have anything to do with the enchant association, please consult with Mounds inside.");
lines.message: If you have anything to do with the enchant association, please consult with Mounds inside.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Welcome.. I have been waiting for you. Are you coming for the hidden enchant service on your cotton shirt?");
lines.message: Welcome.. I have been waiting for you. Are you coming for the hidden enchant service on your cotton shirt?

lines.originalLine: // 			mes("Eummm?");
lines.message: Eummm?

lines.originalLine: // 			mes("What happened?");
lines.message: What happened?

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Oh... finally you came...");
lines.message: Oh... finally you came...

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Has your ^142cebCotton Shirt[1]^000000 been equipped? Shall we start now? Ready?");
lines.message: Has your ^142cebCotton Shirt[1]^000000 been equipped? Shall we start now? Ready?

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Heh... is that so? Frankly, it is my first time... I am really excited.");
lines.message: Heh... is that so? Frankly, it is my first time... I am really excited.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Are you ready? Yes? Do it now. Now!!");
lines.message: Are you ready? Yes? Do it now. Now!!

lines.originalLine: // 			mes("Heh? Eh? Hik?! Come here quick.");
lines.message: Heh? Eh? Hik?! Come here quick.

lines.originalLine: // 			mes("Please come back after you have equipped the Cotton Shirt.");
lines.message: Please come back after you have equipped the Cotton Shirt.

lines.originalLine: // 			mes("Hing, it is not a normal Cotton Shirt.");
lines.message: Hing, it is not a normal Cotton Shirt.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Now!! Start the first hidden enchant!! Start!!!!!");
lines.message: Now!! Start the first hidden enchant!! Start!!!!!

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Zzazanzn!! Completed!!");
lines.message: Zzazanzn!! Completed!!

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("How about it? Don't you think the hidden enchant is great? Any chance to do another hidden enchant?");
lines.message: How about it? Don't you think the hidden enchant is great? Any chance to do another hidden enchant?

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("It's fun. I want to do it again. Hey, another trial Ok? Aaaaa!!! I want to do the hidden enchant again.");
lines.message: It's fun. I want to do it again. Hey, another trial Ok? Aaaaa!!! I want to do the hidden enchant again.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Gradually you are getting into your own world. You better go back to Mounds.");
lines.message: Gradually you are getting into your own world. You better go back to Mounds.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Heh heh... how are you? I am doing a ^142CEB service of free hidden enchant for the beginner's weapon to advertise the enchant association.^000000.");
lines.message: Heh heh... how are you? I am doing a ^142CEB service of free hidden enchant for the beginner's weapon to advertise the enchant association.^000000.

lines.originalLine: // 	mes("As you are still a beginner, you don't have a very, very, very functional jewelry, but soon you will have.");
lines.message: As you are still a beginner, you don't have a very, very, very functional jewelry, but soon you will have.

lines.originalLine: // 	mes("How about it? Will you try the hidden enchant for the beginner's weapon free of charge?");
lines.message: How about it? Will you try the hidden enchant for the beginner's weapon free of charge?

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Ah!! Weapons? Hehehe.. I didn't explain it to you enough.");
lines.message: Ah!! Weapons? Hehehe.. I didn't explain it to you enough.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("The weapon to be serviced with the free hidden enchant has the ^FD4F02Novice^000000 name in front of the weapon.");
lines.message: The weapon to be serviced with the free hidden enchant has the ^FD4F02Novice^000000 name in front of the weapon.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("^FD4F02For Novices-");
lines.message: ^FD4F02For Novices-

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Cutter, Mace, Rod, Axe, Etc.");
lines.message: Cutter, Mace, Rod, Axe, Etc.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Where are you going? You should do the hidden enchant before going.");
lines.message: Where are you going? You should do the hidden enchant before going.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Hehehe... hidden enchant makes me excited. But you should come back with your weapon armed.");
lines.message: Hehehe... hidden enchant makes me excited. But you should come back with your weapon armed.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("It is!! ^142ceb the Novice Knife^000000.");
lines.message: It is!! ^142ceb the Novice Knife^000000.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("But this weapon might be strange to add a hidden enchant? Sorry.");
lines.message: But this weapon might be strange to add a hidden enchant? Sorry.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("It is!! The ^142ceb"+ getequipname(EQI_HAND_R) +"^000000.");
lines.message: It is!! The ^142ceb+ getequipname(EQI_HAND_R) +^000000.

lines.originalLine: // 		mes("Ehee.. It is not a Novice Weapon. Leaving this expensive weapon to us and if broken... I'm not taking that chance.");
lines.message: Ehee.. It is not a Novice Weapon. Leaving this expensive weapon to us and if broken... I'm not taking that chance.

lines.originalLine: // 	mes("It is a good weapon Then!! Let's start the hidden enchant!!");
lines.message: It is a good weapon Then!! Let's start the hidden enchant!!

lines.originalLine: // 	mes("As I'm too excited, I can't check the options. Please check it yourself.");
lines.message: As I'm too excited, I can't check the options. Please check it yourself.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Repair Man]");
lines.message: [Repair Man]

lines.originalLine: mes("Repairing broken equipment!! If you have broken equipment, bring it to me anytime.");
lines.message: Repairing broken equipment!! If you have broken equipment, bring it to me anytime.

lines.originalLine: mes("You must treat your equipment carefully... as you don't have anything to be repaired.");
lines.message: You must treat your equipment carefully... as you don't have anything to be repaired.

lines.originalLine: mes("Hmmm... let's see... oh.. hmm...");
lines.message: Hmmm... let's see... oh.. hmm...

lines.originalLine: mes("Damaged Equipment Estimate");
lines.message: Damaged Equipment Estimate

lines.originalLine: mes("Would you like to proceed with the repair?");
lines.message: Would you like to proceed with the repair?

lines.originalLine: mes("Well, I don't care. After all, it's not my equipment. However, leaving equipment unchecked is not a wise choice.");
lines.message: Well, I don't care. After all, it's not my equipment. However, leaving equipment unchecked is not a wise choice.

lines.originalLine: mes("The repair cost is 5000 Zeny per damaged equipment. You do not have enough money.");
lines.message: The repair cost is 5000 Zeny per damaged equipment. You do not have enough money.

lines.originalLine: mes("The repair has been completed. Be sure to take good care of your equipment.");
lines.message: The repair has been completed. Be sure to take good care of your equipment.

lines.originalLine: mes("If you don't have any equipment to be repaired, you may not have something to talk with me about.");
lines.message: If you don't have any equipment to be repaired, you may not have something to talk with me about.

lines.originalLine: mes("A specific skill or boss monster could break your equipment frequently.");
lines.message: A specific skill or boss monster could break your equipment frequently.

lines.originalLine: mes("This doesn't mean that your equipment is gone forever like what happens during refining.");
lines.message: This doesn't mean that your equipment is gone forever like what happens during refining.

lines.originalLine: mes("When your item breaks this way, they won't perform normally...");
lines.message: When your item breaks this way, they won't perform normally...

lines.originalLine: mes("In this case, bring it to me, and I will repair it back to new at the cost of 5000 zeny for each equipment.");
lines.message: In this case, bring it to me, and I will repair it back to new at the cost of 5000 zeny for each equipment.

lines.originalLine: mes("[Training Instructor]");
lines.message: [Training Instructor]

lines.originalLine: mes("The training grounds have been revised.");
lines.message: The training grounds have been revised.

lines.originalLine: mes("I will send you to Izlude.");
lines.message: I will send you to Izlude.
